scripts.single-test-file: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=line
scripts.test-list-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=list
scripts.test-line-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=line
scripts.test-dot-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=dot
scripts.test-html-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=html
scripts.test-json-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=json
scripts.test-junit-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=junit
scripts.e2e: npm run clean && playwright test -c e2e.config.js
scripts.e2e-commandline-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test -c e2e.config.js --reporter=line,./my-awesome-reporter.js,allure-playwright
